name: quasar-ui-vdp-form
author: project@yeswehack.com
description: A form to anonymously disclose vulnerabilities

scripts.dev: echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn dev
scripts.dev:ssr: echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn 'dev:ssr'
scripts.dev:ios: echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn 'dev:ios'
scripts.dev:android: echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn 'dev:android'
scripts.dev:electron: echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn 'dev:electron'
scripts.dev:backend: cd dev-backend && yarn install && yarn dev
scripts.lint: $(yarn bin eslint) --ext .js,.ts,.vue ./src && echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn lint
scripts.format: $(yarn bin prettier) --write "./{src,build}/**/*.{js,mjs,ts,vue,scss,html,md,json}" --ignore-path .gitignore && echo 'Entering ./dev' && cd dev && yarn install && yarn format && cd .. && echo 'Entering ./dev-backend' && cd dev-backend && yarn install && yarn format
